channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Cheap Eats
channel.desc: Traveling can be expensive, with airfare and hotel accommodations often costing hundreds of dollars each, so when you're on a vacation, you likely want to try to cut expenses in some areas. Food blogger Ali Khan can help you save on food costs in various American cities. In each episode of "Cheap Eats," he spends 12 hours in a given locale and has a $35 food budget. With that cash, he must maximize his investment for breakfast, lunch, a snack and dinner - getting the biggest and tastiest delicacies he can find while staying under his limit. As he explores affordable options in each city, Khan meets with local chefs to find out about the area's culinary scene.
